kpi.name: M114B2C5

kpi_info.title: The number of rejected service requests
kpi_info.use: The number of rejected service requests (0...999999999) that have exceeded the higher rejection limit of the message buffer on the outgoing side. The number of rejected service requests that have exceeded the higher rejection limit of the CPU load on the incoming side.

kpi.kpi_alias: The number of rejected service requests
